notifications.not_enough_bottle_caps: Your bottle caps run dry; you need more to proceed.
notifications.not_enough_items: You lack enough {product} to complete this deal.
notifications.invalid_product: That item doesn't appear in the Hobo King's collection.
notifications.invalid_payout_config: The payment method seems off—check your coinage!
notifications.dumpster_on_cooldown: That's as empty as last night's soup can.
notifications.hobo_loot_cooldown: Give the hobo some time to gather more junk before trying again.
notifications.hobo_loot_success: Your cunning rummage pays off! You've looted the hobo successfully!
notifications.purchase_error: Something went awry with your purchase. Try again later.
notifications.sell_error: Your sale encountered an error. Perhaps the Hobo King is displeased.
notifications.camp_looted_recently: This camp has already been picked clean! Give it some time to gather new treasures.
notifications.camp_loot_success: You scavenge the camp and find a few interesting items. Nice haul!
notifications.camp_loot_canceled: You stopped looting the camp. Maybe next time!
notifications.hobo_already_looted: This hobo has already been looted.
notifications.camp_already_looted: This camp has been picked clean. Give it some time to replenish.
notifications.missing_item: This Dumpster is locked. You'll need something to get it open!
notifications.bag_empty: This bag is empty. No valuables to be found.
notifications.no_valuables: Unfortunately, there was nothing valuable inside this bag.
notifications.valuables_found: You've found something valuable! Destroy the bag!
notifications.bag_loot_granted: You've successfully looted the bag. Enjoy your spoils!
notifications.cannot_carry_all: You can't carry all of the loot, make some space in your inventory.
notifications.no_loot_found: You didn't find anything valuable, better luck next time
notifications.recycling_started: You've started the recycling process. This will take some time.
notifications.recycling_ready: Your materials are fully processed and ready for collection!
notifications.items_collected: You've successfully collected your recycled materials.
notifications.no_items_ready: There are no recycled items available for collection.
notifications.recycling_failed: Recycling process failed. Try again later.
notifications.cannot_recycle_now: You can't recycle at this moment. Try again later.
notifications.recycler_finished_success: You have retrieved the items from the recycler.
notifications.recycler_finished_fail: There was an issue retrieving the items from the recycler. Please try again.

hobo.king_description: Ah, a new face! Your scrounging level stands at {level}.
hobo.shop_description: Browse a trove of peculiar odds and ends.
hobo.purchase_success: You have secured {item} from the King's stash!
hobo.advice_description: The King has seen much of the world—perhaps he'll share some sage advice with you...
hobo.advice_response: Wisdom is the only treasure that doesn't weigh you down.
hobo.shop_menu_description: Trade your valuables, or acquire new trinkets.
hobo.shop_buy_description: Peruse the King's selection of wares.
hobo.shop_sell_description: Offer your findings to the King for coin.
hobo.sell_prompt: How many {item}s do you wish to relinquish?
hobo.confirm_sale: Shall you sell {quantity} x {product} for a tidy {totalCost}?
hobo.rat_menu_desc: Open your rat menu to manage your rodent companion.
hobo.advice_quote_1: Remember, one man's trash is another man's treasure!
hobo.advice_quote_2: The early bird gets the worm, but the second mouse gets the cheese.
hobo.advice_quote_3: Not all who wander are lost.
hobo.advice_quote_4: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.
hobo.advice_quote_5: Patience is a virtue; good things come to those who wait.
hobo.advice_warn: Look, kid, don't you have anything better to do?
hobo.advice_final_warn: Alright, that's enough. Get lost before I make you regret it.
hobo.advice_piss_off: I said PISS OFF! What part of that didn't you understand?
hobo.king_ignore: The Hobo King glares at you with disdain and refuses to interact further.
hobo.show_stats_description: View all you've gathered, scored, and salvaged so far.
hobo.show_milestones_description: Track your progress and claim well-earned rewards.
hobo.dumpsters_searched_desc_m: You've searched {current} out of {required} dumpsters. Claiming this milestone will award you with {reward}.
hobo.hobo_looted_desc: You've looted {current} out of {required} hobos. Claiming this milestone will award you with {reward}.
hobo.bags_looted_desc_m: You've looted {current} out of {required} trash bags. Claiming this milestone will award you with {reward}.
hobo.camp_searched_desc: You've searched {current} out of {required} camps. Claiming this milestone will award you with {reward}.
hobo.milestone_desc: You've collected {current} out of {required} {item}. Claiming this milestone will award you with {reward}.
hobo.no_stats_desc: You haven't rummaged enough to have any stats available.
hobo.stat_value: You've collected a total of {value} {item} so far.
hobo.dumpsters_searched_desc: You've searched a total of {value} Dumpsters so far.
hobo.no_milestones_desc: You haven't reached any milestones yet. Keep searching!
hobo.already_redeemed: This milestone has already been redeemed.
hobo.not_completed: You have not completed the requirements for this milestone.
hobo.redeem_error: An error occurred while redeeming your milestone.
hobo.leaderboard_description: View the top 5 players globally. The score is calculated based on a persons Level and Statistics.
hobo.no_leaderboard_desc: There are currently no players on the leaderboard.
hobo.leaderboard_slot_empty_desc: No player has occupied this rank yet.
hobo.hobos_looted_desc: You've successfully looted {value} hobo(s) so far.
hobo.camps_searched_desc: You've searched a total {value} hobo camp(s) so far.
hobo.bags_looted_desc: You've searched a total of {value} bag(s) so far.

rat.buy_desc: Secure a scruffy companion for just ${price}.
rat.purchase_success: You have successfully adopted your new rodent friend!
rat.purchase_fail: Alas, the adoption failed. Perhaps fate will favor you next time.
rat.already_owned: You already have a scruffy companion.
rat.insufficient_funds: Your coin purse is as empty as an abandoned dumpster.
rat.purchase_success_msg: A new rodent friend has joined your side! Treat {name} well.
rat.profile_desc: Your Rat companion, {name}, has reached level {level}.
rat.stats_desc: Review your rat's record: see how many expeditions it has embarked upon and the volume of scavenged trash collected for you.
rat.perks_desc: Unlock and upgrade your rat's abilities to boost its speed, efficiency on expeditions, and more.
rat.expedition_desc: Send {name} on a daring adventure for extra XP!
rat.expedition_in_progress: Your rodent companion is currently on an expedition. Progress: {progress}% completed. Time remaining: {hours}h {minutes}m {seconds}s.
rat.expedition_desc_main: Launch your rat on a quest to gather wisdom, XP, and valuable loot.
rat.refresh_desc: Reload the current rat management menu to see updated information.
rat.free_desc: Set your faithful companion free to explore the world on its own terms.
rat.free_success: You have set {name} free to roam the wild streets.
rat.free_fail: You don't have a companion to release.
rat.perk_fleet_footed_desc: Increases expedition speed, so your rat scurries quicker than ever.
rat.perk_scavenger_supreme_desc: Boosts your rat's carrying capacity, allowing for more loot on every run.
rat.perk_lucky_whiskers_desc: Enhances your rat's luck, increasing chances to receive rare items!
rat.perk_safety_paws_desc: Reduces expedition risks, ensuring your rodent friend returns unscathed.
rat.perk_navigator_nibbler_desc: Sharpens your rat's navigational skills, shortening expedition durations.
rat.perk_quick_recovery_desc: Reduces injury recovery time, enabling your rat to bounce back and resume expeditions faster.
rat.no_perk_points: You don't have any perk points left to assign.
rat.name_dialog_desc: What shall your scruffy sidekick be called?
rat.buy_cancelled: Rat acquisition aborted. A companion must have a name!
rat.free_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to set your rodent friend free? This action cannot be undone.
rat.no_rat_owned: You do not own a rat.
rat.follow_on: Your rat scampers into view and begins following you.
rat.follow_off: Your rat runs off and has returned home.
rat.returned_home: Your rat got too far away and has returned home.
rat.no_stats_desc: You haven't recorded any rat stats yet. Send your rat on expeditions to build up your statistics.
rat.perks_disabled_desc: Your rat is currently on an expedition and you cannot upgrade its perks right now.
rat.free_disabled_desc: Your rat is on an expedition and cannot be freed until it safely returns.
rat.expedition_returned_desc: Your rat has returned from the expedition with {items} item(s). Click here to collect what he's brought.
rat.expedition_returned_injured_desc: Your rat has returned with {items} item(s) but was injured. Recovery will take {recovery} seconds.
rat.perks_injured_desc: Your rat was injured during an expedition, so perk upgrades are temporarily disabled until it has fully recovered.
rat.free_injured_desc: Your rat was injured during an expedition and cannot be released until it has fully recovered.
rat.expedition_injured_disabled_desc: Your rat is still injured and cannot start a new expedition until fully recovered.
rat.expeditions_completed_desc: Your companion has been on {value} successful expedition(s).
rat.times_injured_desc: Your companion has been injured {value} time(s) during expeditions.
rat.item_recovered: Your companion has recovered {value} {item} so far.
rat.expedition_sent: Your rat has been sent on the {expedition} expedition!
rat.buy_level_restricted: Requires Level {level} to adopt a rodent companion.
rat.no_expeditions_desc: There are no expeditions configured at this time.

recycler.title: Recycler
recycler.insert_success: You inserted {quantity} x {item} into the recycler.
recycler.insert_fail: Failed to insert {item}. Do you even have it?
recycler.remove_prompt: Click to remove this item from the recycler.
recycler.remove_success: You removed {quantity} x {item} from the recycler.
recycler.view_inserted_desc: See what you've added to the recycler.
recycler.start_recycling_desc2: Double-check all items. Once this process begins, there’s no going back! This might take some time.
recycler.recycling_in_progress: Started Recycling, this might take some time.
recycler.recycling_complete: Recycling complete! You received {quantity} x scrap metal.
recycler.recycling_time: The recycler is hard at work. Time left: {time} seconds.
recycler.no_active_desc: Start a new recycling process to break down materials.
recycler.recycling_complete_ready: Your recycled materials are ready to be collected!
recycler.recycling_failed: Something went wrong during the recycling process. Try again.
recycler.return_main_desc: Go back to the main recycler menu.
recycler.return_confirm_desc: Go back to the confirmation menu.
recycler.collect_items_desc: Retrieve the processed materials from the recycler.
recycler.no_items_to_recycle_desc: You must insert materials before starting the recycling process.
recycler.recycling_ready_desc: Your recycled materials are ready for pickup.
recycler.no_items_to_collect: There are no items ready for collection.
recycler.return_collect_desc: Go back to the collection menu.

dumpster.loot_start: You start rifling through the trash, hoping for a hidden gem...
dumpster.stash_open: You pry open a secret stash concealed under debris.
dumpster.hide_in: You shimmy into the cramped space of the dumpster. Press [E] to emerge.
dumpster.exit: You slip out of the dumpster, trying not to make too much noise.
dumpster.needle_poke: Ouch! A stray needle got you!
dumpster.hobo_defeated: You have toppled the hobo in fierce combat!
dumpster.hobo_escaped: The hobo vanished into the night!
dumpster.hobo_attack: A raging hobo charges at you with wild abandon!
